snippet.title: Earth From Another Sun - Official Trailer | The MIX | Kinda Funny Spring Showcase 2025
snippet.description: Earth From Another Sun will be available in Early Access in Q4 2025. Learn more about Earth From Another Sun in this new trailer for the upcoming base-building rogue-lite colony sim FPS game. Command a totalitarian state in humanity's darkest hour in this base-building first-person shooter with roguelite elements. Build and manage your base and subjects, form your battalion, craft gear, explore space for resources, and lead your troops against the Urslan menace.
